name: KurtzPel - Essential Pack
detailed_description:
※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable.
※ The Character Rebirth Ticket is a consumable item and will be consumed upon one time use.

An Essential Package for the Chaser who begins KurtzPel.
The package contains exclusive socks with great discount rates.
Included Items:
- Character Rebirth Ticket X 1
- Striped Knee-high Long Socks X 1
- Knee-length Socks X 1
- Ankle Socks X 1

short_description: ※ The content of this DLC purchase will be applied immediately. This DLC purchase is not refundable. ※ The Character Rebirth Ticket is a consumable item and will be consumed upon one time use. An Essential Package for the Chaser who begins KurtzPel. The package contains exclusive socks with great discount rates.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 6100 3.7 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 ti or AMD Radeon™ R7 360 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Low" (720p/60fps when "High")
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 6500 3.2 GHz or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/40fps when graphics settings are set to "High"
